author: ctessum
title: Add Emissions connectors as an extension
description:
We can add an emissions connector extension using the same methodology described here: https://github.com/EarthSciML/AtmosphericDeposition.jl/issues/22

We can take the actual code for the connector from here: https://github.com/jialinl6/box_model/blob/c65a56a328d865c119f2148efabb9d72bc5641b7/s_f_e.jl#L16

And here: https://github.com/jialinl6/box_model/blob/c65a56a328d865c119f2148efabb9d72bc5641b7/s_f_e.jl#L78

(Also add tests and documentation
